addbridgeoutputs.name: AddBridgeOutputs

addbridgesources.description: Grants permission to add sources to an existing bridge

addflowmediastreams.description: Grants permission to add media streams to any flow

addflowoutputs.name: AddFlowOutputs
addflowoutputs.description: Grants permission to add outputs to any flow

addflowsources.name: AddFlowSources
addflowsources.description: Grants permission to add sources to any flow

addflowvpcinterfaces.name: AddFlowVpcInterfaces
addflowvpcinterfaces.description: Grants permission to add VPC interfaces to any flow

associaterouternetworkinterface.name: AssociateRouterNetworkInterface
associaterouternetworkinterface.description: Grants permission to associate a router network interface

createrouterinput.name: CreateRouterInput
createrouterinput.description: Grants permission to create a new router input in AWS Elemental MediaConnect

createrouternetworkinterface.name: CreateRouterNetworkInterface
createrouternetworkinterface.description: Grants permission to create a new router network interface in AWS Elemental MediaConnect

createrouteroutput.name: CreateRouterOutput
createrouteroutput.description: Grants permission to create a new router output in AWS Elemental MediaConnect

deleterouterinput.description: Grants permission to delete a router input in AWS Elemental MediaConnect

deleterouternetworkinterface.description: Grants permission to delete a router network interface from AWS Elemental MediaConnect

deleterouteroutput.name: DeleteRouterOutput
deleterouteroutput.description: Grants permission to delete a router output from AWS Elemental MediaConnect

deregistergatewayinstance.name: DeregisterGatewayInstance
deregistergatewayinstance.description: Grants permission to deregister gateway instance

describebridge.name: DescribeBridge
describebridge.description: Grants permission to display the details of a bridge

describeflow.name: DescribeFlow
describeflow.description: Grants permission to display the details of a flow including the flow ARN, name, and Availability Zone, as well as details about the source, outputs, and entitlements

describeflowsourcemetadata.name: DescribeFlowSourceMetadata
describeflowsourcemetadata.description: Grants permission to view information about the flow's source transport stream and programs

describeflowsourcethumbnail.name: DescribeFlowSourceThumbnail
describeflowsourcethumbnail.description: Grants permission to view flow's source thumbnail

describegateway.name: DescribeGateway
describegateway.description: Grants permission to display the details of a gateway including the gateway ARN, name, and CIDR blocks, as well as details about the networks

describegatewayinstance.name: DescribeGatewayInstance
describegatewayinstance.description: Grants permission to display the details of a gateway instance

describeoffering.name: DescribeOffering
describeoffering.description: Grants permission to display the details of an offering

describereservation.name: DescribeReservation
describereservation.description: Grants permission to display the details of a reservation

discovergatewaypollendpoint.name: DiscoverGatewayPollEndpoint
discovergatewaypollendpoint.description: Grants permission to discover gateway poll endpoint

getrouterinput.name: GetRouterInput
getrouterinput.description: Grants permission to retrieve information about a specific router input in AWS Elemental MediaConnect

getrouterinputsourcemetadata.name: GetRouterInputSourceMetadata
getrouterinputsourcemetadata.description: Grants permission to retrieve metadata about a router input source in AWS Elemental MediaConnect

getrouterinputthumbnail.name: GetRouterInputThumbnail
getrouterinputthumbnail.description: Grants permission to retrieve the thumbnail for a router input in AWS Elemental MediaConnect

getrouternetworkinterface.name: GetRouterNetworkInterface
getrouternetworkinterface.description: Grants permission to retrieve information about a specific router network interface in AWS Elemental MediaConnect

getrouteroutput.name: GetRouterOutput
getrouteroutput.description: Grants permission to retrieve information about a specific router output in AWS Elemental MediaConnect

grantflowentitlements.name: GrantFlowEntitlements
grantflowentitlements.description: Grants permission to grant entitlements on any flow

listbridges.name: ListBridges
listbridges.description: Grants permission to display a list of bridges that are associated with this account and an optionally specified Arn

listentitlements.name: ListEntitlements
listentitlements.description: Grants permission to display a list of all entitlements that have been granted to the account

listflows.name: ListFlows
listflows.description: Grants permission to display a list of flows that are associated with this account

listgatewayinstances.name: ListGatewayInstances
listgatewayinstances.description: Grants permission to display a list of instances that are associated with this gateway

listgateways.name: ListGateways
listgateways.description: Grants permission to display a list of gateways that are associated with this account

listofferings.name: ListOfferings
listofferings.description: Grants permission to display a list of all offerings that are available to the account in the current AWS Region

listreservations.name: ListReservations
listreservations.description: Grants permission to display a list of all reservations that have been purchased by the account in the current AWS Region

listrouterinputs.name: ListRouterInputs
listrouterinputs.description: Grants permission to retrieve a list of router inputs in AWS Elemental MediaConnect

listrouternetworkinterfaces.name: ListRouterNetworkInterfaces
listrouternetworkinterfaces.description: Grants permission to retrieve a list of router network interfaces in AWS Elemental MediaConnect

listrouteroutputs.name: ListRouterOutputs
listrouteroutputs.description: Grants permission to retrieve a list of router outputs in AWS Elemental MediaConnect

listtagsforresource.name: ListTagsForResource
listtagsforresource.description: Grants permission to display a list of all tags associated with a resource

purchaseoffering.name: PurchaseOffering
purchaseoffering.description: Grants permission to purchase an offering

removebridgeoutput.description: Grants permission to remove an output of an existing bridge

removebridgesource.description: Grants permission to remove a source of an existing bridge

stoprouteroutput.description: Grants permission to stops a router output in AWS Elemental MediaConnect

submitgatewaystatechange.description: Grants permission to submit gateway state change

takerouterinput.description: Grants permission to associate a router input with a router output in AWS Elemental MediaConnect
